New Records: Richie Berrington scored 47 runs for Scotland in the match.
Michael Leask scored 35 runs for Scotland in the match.
Gerhard Erasmus scored 52 runs for Namibia in the match.
Brad Wheal took 3 wickets for Scotland in the match.
Ruben Trumpelmann was run out for Namibia during the match.
Key Match Events: Scotland completed the target of 157 runs in 18.3 overs.
Namibia lost key players like Zane Green and Ruben Trumpelmann due to crucial dismissals.
The match was influenced by Brad Wheal's three-wicket haul and timely runs by Scotland's batting order.
Post-Match Reflections: Gerhard Erasmus, the Namibia captain, expressed frustration about the middle-order collapse.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the T20 World Cup 2024, and live updates were provided throughout the innings.
